solution_line_template: On Tuesday, {tuesday_taken} books were taken, so there are {initial_books} - {tuesday_taken}= <<{initial_books}-{tuesday_taken}={after_tuesday}>>{after_tuesday} books left.

{thursday_brought_back} books were brought back on Thursday, so there are {after_tuesday} + {thursday_brought_back} = <<{after_tuesday}+{thursday_brought_back}={after_thursday}>>{after_thursday} books in the library.
Finally, {friday_taken} books are taken out on Friday, leaving {after_thursday} - {friday_taken} = <<{after_thursday}-{friday_taken}={after_friday}>>{after_friday} books available.
